definition: affection/family love/love, esp. within a married couple or between parents and children
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: The motherless children were starving for affection.
sentences.chinese: 这些没有母亲的孩子渴望亲情。

sentences.english: A newborn is ready to bond to its parents.
sentences.chinese: 新生儿很容易对其父母产生亲情。

sentences.english: The reality, let us all very helpless, let us fight but time distance affection.
sentences.chinese: 现实，让我们都很无奈，让我们斗不过时间距离亲情。

sentences.english: Years burning passion, make close affection warm rectify an individual to be born.
sentences.chinese: 燃情岁月，让亲情温暖整个人生。

sentences.english: Small pearl heart deep affection for comfort.
sentences.chinese: 小珍珠内心深深渴盼亲情慰藉。

sentences.english: This group must learn how to treasure the feeling of the family membres.
sentences.chinese: 这一群体必须学会如何珍惜亲情。

sentences.english: Section III The importance of family-member-loving education.
Kinship is healing , we are physicians to each other .

sentences.english: Open heart, you will feel the warmth of family ties , the value of friendship.
sentences.chinese: 打开心儿，你会感受到亲情的温暖，友情的可贵。

sentences.english: Dear ones, is also a sharp sword, for did not know repents a person move of strength divides Huashan.

sentences.english: The family is a deeply emotional, is a treasure beyond time and space.
sentences.chinese: 亲情是一种血肉相连的情感，是一笔超越时空的财富。

sentences.english: Love is eternal, love is easy to be old, sincere friendship enduring as the universe.
sentences.chinese: 亲情不灭，爱情易老，真挚的友情天长地久。

sentences.english: The dear ones, are the Arab League splendid Two Reflecting Founts's melody.
sentences.chinese: 亲情，是阿炳二泉映月的旋律。

sentences.english: Many things, Y0U Don't say, I also know.
sentences.chinese: 你不用说，我也知道，因为亲情。

sentences.english: Perhaps, family uggs uk friendship love tired heart had to accompany the course?

sentences.english: Section IV The implementation to the family-member-loving education in Chinese language teaching.
sentences.chinese: 亲情教育在语文教学中的实施。

definition: blood is thicker than water/fig. family ties are closer than social relations
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
lit. the cow licking its calf fondly (idiom)/fig. to show deep affection towards one's children
